sense.gloss: light (i.e. not heavy), feeling light (i.e. offering little resistance, moving easily)
light (i.e. of foot), effortless, nimble, agile
slight, small, gentle, soft, easy, lighthearted (e.g. joke)
light motor vehicle (up to 660cc and 64bhp), kei car
making light of, thinking little of, slighting, belittling, dismissing, contempt, disdain
contempt, scorn, disdain, despising, looking down on, slighting
light-hearted, cheerful, buoyant, jaunty, casual (e.g. clothing), rhythmical (e.g. melody)
taking a turn for the better (of an illness), receding of symptoms, recovery, convalescence

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓を↑軽蔑↑↓けいべつ↓するべきではない。
sdata.e: You shouldn't look down on him.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はこの↑結果↑↓けっか↓を↑軽視↑↓けいし↓すべきじゃない。
sdata.e: You should not think little of this result.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑申↑↓もう↓し↑出↑↓で↓を↑受↑↓う↓けるとは↑軽↑↓かる↓はずみだったね。
sdata.e: It was foolish of you to accept his offer.

sdata.j: ↑金持↑↓かねも↓ちは↑貧乏人↑↓びんぼうにん↓を↑軽蔑↑↓けいべつ↓しがちだ。
sdata.e: The rich are apt to look down upon the poor.

sdata.j: ↑金持↑↓かねも↓ちは↑貧↑↓まず↓しい↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓を↑軽蔑↑↓けいべつ↓しがちだ。
sdata.e: The rich are apt to look down upon the poor.

sdata.j: ↑金持↑↓かねも↓ちは↑人↑↓ひと↓を↑軽蔑↑↓けいべつ↓したがる。
sdata.e: The rich are apt to look down on people.

sdata.j: ↑金持↑↓かねも↓ちは↑人↑↓ひと↓を↑軽蔑↑↓けいべつ↓しがちである。
sdata.e: The rich are apt to look down on people.

sdata.j: ↑金↑↓きん↓をそれほど↑持↑↓も↓っていないという↑理由↑↓りゆう↓で↑他人↑↓たにん↓を↑軽↑↓けい↓べつする↑人↑↓ひと↓もいる。
sdata.e: Some people look down on others because they have less money.

sdata.j: ↑近頃↑↓ちかごろ↓は↑正直↑↓しょうじき↓が↑軽↑↓かる↓んじられているようだ。
sdata.e: Honesty seems to be rather at a discount today.

sdata.j: この↑頃↑↓ころ↓、↑正直↑↓しょうじき↓さがかなり↑軽↑↓かる↓んじられているようだ。
sdata.e: Honesty seems to be rather at a discount today.

words.gloss: light (i.e. not heavy), feeling light (i.e. offering little resistance, moving easily)
